title: High-coordinated Fe-N5 sites effectively promoted peroxymonosulfate activation for degradation of 4-chlorophenol
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00189C, Paper
Manoj Kumar Panjwani, Feyu Gao, Ting He, gao pan, Feng Xiao, Shaoxia Yang
M-Nx single-atom catalysts (SACs) with a higher coordination number (x>4) are effective catalysts for eliminating organic pollutants, while the origin of SACs with high activity still remains elusive. In this...
